outline:
1. staff, branch, tribe
    1. staff, rod, shaft
    2. branch (of vine)
    3. tribe
      1. company led by chief with staff (originally)
strongs_def: a branch (as extending); figuratively, a tribe; also a rod, whether for chastising (figuratively, correction), ruling (a sceptre), throwing (a lance), or walking (a staff; figuratively, a support of life, e.g. bread)
